posts.post_content:
I've started on a new collecting goal to keep me occupied waiting on Des Moines OJs.  

From my count there's 361 common T206s.  I'm going to see how many of them I can pick up for between $15-$25.  I know that many will say that I can't get them that cheap.  I started 3 weeks ago and have picked up a handful.  No condition is too rough.  This is just a fun project.  Curious to see how many I can get in 1 year.

Message me if you have any T206 that meet my terms.

Thanks Craig

Bump

I'm still looking to buy your beaters.  No card is too rough.  Please keep messaging me if you have any in the $15-$25 range.  I'm almost up to 50.  Help me push closer to 100.

Thanks Craig
Sticking to the budget and searching for the worst of the worst was half the fun when putting together my set of beaters. They’re out there. Best of luck.

Who's got one or fifty?  Still looking to add more to my growing group.

Cheers Craig
I have a couple lots of 10 on eBay right now. 54 total, lower grade ones are $20 a piece.
